changelog.title: EC-Council CSE Cloud Modules
changelog.description: 5 new Cloud Security Essentials modules covering fundamentals, IAM, encryption, network security, and application security.

changelog.title: EC-Council CSE Shield Modules
changelog.description: 3 new security operations modules covering monitoring & incident response, risk management, and compliance governance.

changelog.title: Professional Curriculum
changelog.description: All 8 modules derived from EC-Council's official Cloud Security Essentials v1 certification program.

changelog.title: Industry Frameworks
changelog.description: Comprehensive coverage of NIST RMF, NIST CSF, GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS, SOX, and cloud compliance tools.
